author: Ross Burden
method: Heat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the tamarillo in a roasting dish and sprinkle with sugar and red wine. Roast for 15 minutes until soft and syrupy. To serve, spoon into a bowl and serve with Greek yoghurt.
ingredients: 1 tamarillo, halved,  25g/1oz caster sugar,  50ml/2fl oz red wine,  2 tbsp Greek yoghurt, to serve
